com.adobe.platform.operation.pdfops

Class ReplaceFilesOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.platform.operation.pdfops.ReplaceFilesOperation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operation

    public class ReplaceFilesOperation
extends Object
implements Operation
    An operation that allows specific pages in a PDF file to be replaced with pages from multiple PDF files.

    Sample Usage: 

       ReplaceFilesOperation replaceFilesOperation = ReplaceFilesOperation.createNew();
   replaceFilesOperation.setBaseInput(FileRef.createFromLocalFile("~/Documents/replaceFilesOperationBaseInput.pdf",
                                                             ReplaceFilesOperation.SupportedSourceFormat.PDF.getMediaType()));
   ReplaceFilesOperation.replacePagesFromFileAt(1, FileRef.createFromLocalFile("~/Documents/replaceFilesOperationFileToBeReplacedWithInput.pdf",
                                                             ReplaceFilesOperation.SupportedSourceFormat.PDF.getMediaType()));
   Credentials credentials = Credentials.serviceAccountCredentialsBuilder().fromFile("dc-services-sdk-credentials.json").build();
   FileRef result = replaceFilesOperation.execute(ExecutionContext.create(credentials));
   result.saveAs("output/replaceFilesOperationOutput.pdf");

      Supported source file formats for ReplaceFilesOperation.

      • replacePagesFromFileAt

        public void replacePagesFromFileAt(int baseFileIndex,
                                   FileRef fileToBeReplacedWith)
        Replaces the page specified by the index of the base PDF file, by the PDF file to be replaced with.
        Parameters:
        baseFileIndex - index of base PDF file which will be replaced with the input PDF file
        fileToBeReplacedWith - a PDF file to be replaced with; can not be null

      • replacePagesFromFileAt

        public void replacePagesFromFileAt(int baseFileIndex,
                                   FileRef fileToBeReplacedWith,
                                   int numOfPages)
        Replaces the page specified by the index of the base PDF file, by the specified number of pages of the PDF file to be replaced with, starting from the first page.
        Parameters:
        baseFileIndex - index of base PDF file which will be replaced with the specified pages of input PDF file
        fileToBeReplacedWith - a PDF file to be replaced with; can not be null
        numOfPages - specifies the number of pages of input PDF file, starting from the first page

      • execute

        public FileRef execute(ExecutionContext context)
                throws ServiceApiException,
                       IOException,
                       ServiceUsageException
        Executes this operation synchronously using the supplied context and returns a new FileRef instance for the resulting PDF file.

        The resulting file may be stored in the system temporary directory (per java.io.tmpdir System property). See FileRef for how temporary resources are cleaned up.

        Specified by:
        execute in interface Operation
        Parameters:
        context - the context in which to execute the operation
        Returns:
        the resulting PDF file
        Throws:
        ServiceApiException - if an API call results in an error response
        IOException - if there is an error in reading either the input source or the resulting PDF file
        ServiceUsageException - if service usage limits have been reached or credentials quota has been exhausted
